## The Linear Model

```{r}
d <- read.csv('grades.csv')

plot(d$midterm, d$final,
     xlab = 'Midterm Grade',
     ylab = 'Final Grade')
```

## The Linear Model

```{r}
#| eval: FALSE
m <- lm(final ~ midterm, data = d)


abline(a = m$coefficients['(Intercept)'],
       b = m$coefficients['midterm'])
```

```{r}
#| echo: FALSE
m <- lm(final ~ midterm, data = d)

plot(d$midterm, d$final,
     xlab = 'Midterm Grade',
     ylab = 'Final Grade')
```
